mapper.insert: insert into t_department( department_no, workplace, department_name, staff_id, staff_name, city_id, address, telephone, email, landline, level, upper_department_no, support_business, department_type, status, remark, longitude, latitude, address_detail, create_emp, create_time, modify_emp, modify_time ) values( #{departmentNo}, #{workplace}, #{departmentName}, #{staffId}, #{staffName}, #{cityId}, #{address}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{landline}, #{level}, #{upperDepartmentNo}, #{supportBusiness}, #{departmentType}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{addressDetail}, #{createEmp}, now(), #{modifyEmp}, now() )

SELECT T.id, T.department_no, T.workplace, T.department_name, T.staff_id, T.staff_name, T.city_id, T.address, T.telephone, T.email, T.landline, T.level, T.upper_department_no, T.support_business, T.department_type, T.status, T.create_emp, T.create_time, T.modify_emp, T.modify_time, T.remark, T.longitude, T.latitude, T.address_detail, T2.city_name cityName, T3.account_name createName, T4.account_name modifyName, T5.department_name upperDepartmentName FROM t_department T LEFT JOIN t_b_city T2 ON T.city_id=T2.city_id LEFT JOIN t_account T3 ON T.create_emp=T3.id LEFT JOIN t_account T4 ON T.modify_emp=T4.id LEFT JOIN t_department T5 ON T.upper_department_no=T5.department_no WHERE T.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_department T SET T.department_no=#{departmentNo}, T.workplace=#{workplace}, T.department_name=#{departmentName}, T.staff_id=#{staffId}, T.staff_name=#{staffName}, T.city_id=#{cityId}, T.address=#{address}, T.telephone=#{telephone}, T.email=#{email}, T.landline=#{landline}, T.level=#{level}, T.upper_department_no=#{upperDepartmentNo}, T.support_business=#{supportBusiness}, T.department_type=#{departmentType}, T.status=#{status}, T.modify_emp=#{modifyEmp}, T.modify_time=now(), T.remark=#{remark}, T.longitude=#{longitude}, T.latitude=#{latitude}, T.address_detail=#{addressDetail} WHERE T.id=#{id}
